coded_answer.p: I was really greatfulgrateful when I recievedreceived your letter which informed me that I have won first prize in your competition.

I would like to make this trip the first week or the last week of July. Because because my school finishes at the end of June and I will have a monthmonth's break and after that. I have to do a computing course which I have already applied for it. Could you possibly tell me, at Camp California will I stay in tents or log cabins.? PersonilyPersonally I prefer to stay in log cabins because they are much more comfortable than tents.
I really enjoy swimming and playing tennis. UnfortunetleyUnfortunately I am not good at botheither of them. Maybe I will have time to do enough practisepractice, as much as I always wanted to do.
Could you tell me what sort of clothes I would need to bring with me and will I need any extra money for this holiday.?
I look forward to hearing from you soon!
I don't know where to start but I can say it was the greatestbest time I have ever had.
As I mentioned to you before, a Friendfriend of mine, she is a stage assistant and she needed a help forwith that pop concert last month.

I told her if she needneeded help, I would be happy to help her. Next day, when I went there, I have metmet lots of people who were very famous and very friendly. It took us almost a month to prepare for this concert.
You wouldn't believe how hard it was. theThe stage was covered with all sortsorts of light and we made it look like a waterfall.

The waterfall madewas made byfrom real rock so that was the worst bit because they wereit was really heavy and we had to carry themit, but at the end of the mothmonth when the concert started, it was all over.
I sungsang and dancedanced all day. I have lots of memorymemories which I could never forget.
I hopewish you shared my happiness with me.
